Question
========
  
A randomly selected sample of 75 people filled out a survey in which they indicate if the toilets are at Dutch train stations are clean. 35% of the
participants gave a positive answer, whereas the other 65% answered negatively. Calculate, based on this sample, the 95% confidence interval for
the proportion of people who had a negative opinion.


Answerlist
----------
* (0.489,   0.711)
* (0.507,   0.693)
* (0.289,   0.511)
* (0.307,   0.493)

Solution
========
  
Answerlist

* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
